title: Murmur link issues
body:
06:28 < saq> i have a problem with a big-ish mumble that has many layers of subchannels and linking
06:28 < saq> it seems that if im in channel root/main/sub/tiny
06:29 < saq> and i link to root/main/sub2
06:29 < saq> i can only unlink it from that channel
06:29 < saq> even if i have write acl
06:30 < saq> am i doing something wrong or is this a known issue?
06:30 < saq> seems like admins with write acl in /root/ should be able to unlink anything they want



*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/955/ .
